Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication

Interface ReplicationPeerStorage

All Known Implementing Classes:
FSReplicationPeerStorage, ZKReplicationPeerStorage
@Private public interface ReplicationPeerStorage
Perform read/write to the replication peer storage.

    Return the peer ids of all replication peers.

    Set the state of peer, true to ENABLED, otherwise to DISABLED.

  • Method Details

    • addPeer

      void addPeer(String peerId, ReplicationPeerConfig peerConfig, boolean enabled) throws ReplicationException
      Add a replication peer.
      Throws:
      ReplicationException - if there are errors accessing the storage service.

    • removePeer

      void removePeer(String peerId) throws ReplicationException
      Remove a replication peer.
      Throws:
      ReplicationException - if there are errors accessing the storage service.

    • setPeerState

      void setPeerState(String peerId, boolean enabled) throws ReplicationException
      Set the state of peer, true to ENABLED, otherwise to DISABLED.
      Throws:
      ReplicationException - if there are errors accessing the storage service.

      Update the config a replication peer.
      Throws:
      ReplicationException - if there are errors accessing the storage service.

      Return the peer ids of all replication peers.

      ReplicationException - if there are errors accessing the storage service.
